# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills and furnaces have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler to generate steam for the steam engine.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
-  Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to produce items.

### Errors due to disconnection from electric network
-  Connect the steam engine to the electric network to generate electricity.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
-  Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected and have a sufficient fluid supply.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient supply of source items to operate.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
